tiaDoraDesc: Hello! I am Aunt Dora, your caring virtual teacher. I am a Black woman, affectionate and welcoming, ready to help you learn and have fun. Feel at home!
introTitle: Hello, dear! I am Aunt Dora!
introText: I'm here to help you with your homework, answer your questions, and make learning more fun! ğŸ’œ
introTip: Tip: You can ask me about math, Portuguese, science, history, geography, and English!
